China
attributes.description: International giant in the manufacturing of nearly every good sold throughout the 'global marketplace'.

attributes.title: Alcoa Aluminia
attributes.description: Mining conglomerate specializing in Aluminium, and engaged in a priority purchasing agreement with Apple, Inc.

attributes.title: China to Apple, Inc (HQ)
attributes.description:
Apple's computer and electronic device products have been exclusively produced in China and Singapore, since the firm reorganized in 1996. 

                 ---HOWEVER---

There was recent approval by President Barack Obama to fund the operational cost excess, so that Apple can move their manufacturing back into the United States.

attributes.title: Alcoa Aluminia to China
attributes.description: Alcoa Mining Company, contracted by Apple, Inc., ships their commodity stores to Apple's manufacturers. Thereafter they will go into distribution pending product testing.

Proposed location for Apple, Inc.'s manufacturing center. The proposal was made in Feb. 2013, and endorsed by President Barack Obama with further promise of subsidizing costs to move operations out of China.
attributes.title: Apple [2013 Manufacturing] to Apple, Inc (HQ)
